# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that toggles the enabled status of the URL filter.

## Declaration

```swift
var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If this value is `true`, the URL filter starts filtering URLs. If `false`, the filter stops filtering.

This value defaults to `false`.

## Managing filter life cycle

- **shouldFailClosed**: A Boolean value that determines how the filter behaves if it fails to make a filtering decision.
- **prefilterFetchInterval**: The time interval at which the the filter control provider app extension runs.
